name: biomni-query-pdb-identifiers
title: Biomni: Query PDB Identifiers
description: Retrieve detailed structural data for specific PDB identifiers including coordinates and metadata.
content:
Overview

Queries RCSB PDB for specific structure identifiers to retrieve comprehensive structural information including atomic coordinates, experimental details, and annotations.

Input Parameters

  • identifiers (list, required): PDB IDs (e.g., ["1ABC", "2XYZ"])
  • return_type (string, optional): Data format
  • download (boolean, optional): Download structure files
  • attributes (list, optional): Specific attributes

Biological Use Case

Essential for batch retrieval in computational pipelines and structural bioinformatics. Researchers use this for multiple structure downloads, feature extraction, dataset building for machine learning, and structural comparisons.

Output

Returns JSON (pdb_identifiers_results.json) with structure details including methods, resolution, assemblies, sequences, ligands, and optionally coordinate files.

Category

database
